properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:24AM CST until February 13 at 8:07AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River at Oliver
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...


.Heavy rainfall of three to five inches is forecast over the Black
Warrior River basin during the next 48 hours...and a flood warning
remains in effect along much of the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam.
* from Tuesday morning to Thursday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 7:45 AM Monday the stage was 129.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 140 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow morning  and continue
to rise to near 143.6 feet by Tuesday evening. The river will
fall below flood stage by Wednesday evening.
* Impact...At 146 feet...Industrial flooding becomes more serious as
the Black Warrior River continues to rise. At 140 feet...Some minor
flooding of low-lying areas occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
